wiki.content: Mountains was initially a stand-alone single by Biffy Clyro released on the 18th August 2008. The song became a significant airplay hit and also the bands highest charting single yet; reaching number 5 on the UK singles chart. The track was later included on their fifth studio album, Only Revolutions. Biffy Clyro are Simon Neil and twins Ben and James Johnston, childhood friends from Ayr in Scotland who formed the band in 1995. Their powerful, anthemic single 'Mountains' is their most successful UK hit to date – it stormed to No.5 in the UK chart in late August 2008. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

Biffy Clyro are Simon Neil and twins Ben and James Johnston, childhood friends from Ayr in Scotland who formed the band in 1995.
